<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Érelmeszesedés</string>
            <string language="en">Hardening of the arteries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verhärten der Arterien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Durcissement des artères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Endurecer-se dos arteries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Indurimento delle arterie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκλήρυνση των αρτηριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El endurecer de las arterias</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az artériában kialakult lerakódásról készült rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing made about the deposition emerged in the artery</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">keringés,  érszűkület,  infarktus,  </string>
            <string language="en">circulation, constriction of the vessels, infarction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnung bildete über die Absetzung auftauchte 
in der Arterie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma fait au sujet du dépôt a émergé 
dans l'artère</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho fêz sobre o deposition emergiu no 
artery</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione fatta circa il deposito è emerso
nell'arteria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο που έγινε για την απόθεση προέκυψε στην 
αρτηρία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico hizo sobre la deposición emergió en
la arteria</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulation, Verengung der Behälter, Infarktbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circulation, constriction des navires, infarctus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circulação, constriction das embarcações, 
infarction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circolazione, riduzione dei vasi, infarto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλοφορία, συστολή των σκαφών, έμφραγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circulación, constricción de los recipientes,

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
